extension.summary: LG Smart TV 3D Switch - for WebOS TVs
extension.description: This addon turns your LG Smart TV into 3D mode automatically over the network if tagged '3D' content is playing. For this, the LG TV device must be integrated in your home network properly. This addon supports LG TVs running WebOS.
